#summary k7zx , solo para Spectrum

= Introduction =

k7zx can convert sbb files (created with OtlaBuilder) to wav files


= Details =

OtlaPlayer converts .sbb to .wav using one of the many encoding techniques avalable in spectrum tool k7zx. (Shavings Slow which offers best ratio speed/reliability).

Spectrum users although may preffer other techniques for faster loads
